Sample.Name: ExpensesReport
Sample.Title: Expenses Report
Sample.Description: This example demonstrates how to create a Excel report for expenses with data, chart, formulas, and cell formatting.

Sample.Name: AttendanceTracker
Sample.Title: Attendance Tracker
Sample.Description: This example demonstrates how to create monthly attendace tracking Excel reports.

Sample.Name: CreateSpreadsheet
Sample.Title: Create Spreadsheet
Sample.Description: This example demonstrates how to create a simple Excel document with text, numbers, formulas and styles.

Sample.Name: Formula
Sample.Title: Formula
Sample.Description: This example demonstrates how to create, read a formula and access its calculated value.

Sample.Name: Chart
Sample.Title: Chart
Sample.Description: This example demonstrates how to create a chart.

Sample.Name: DataValidation
Sample.Title: Data Validation
Sample.Description: This example shows how to set data validation rules for cells in Excel document.

Sample.Name: TemplateMarker
Sample.Title: Template Marker
Sample.Description: This example demonstrates the usage of template marker which is a special symbol and shows how import data to Excel document.

Sample.Name: Table
Sample.Title: Table
Sample.Description: This example demonstrates how to create a table on a range of cells.

Sample.Name: AutoShapes
Sample.Title: Auto Shapes
Sample.Description: This example demonstrates how to use auto shapes in Excel documents.

Sample.Name: WorksheetToImage
Sample.Title: Worksheet to Image
Sample.Description: This example demonstrates how to convert a Excel worksheet to image.

Sample.Name: ExcelToPDF
Sample.Title: Excel to PDF
Sample.Description: This example demonstrates how to convert a Excel document to PDF.
